name: Hornari
description: Hornari is a majestic and powerful pokemon that is rarely seen outside of its canyon-like habitats. With its ornate horns, it is well-known for its agility and cunning. This pokemon is an expert at anticipating its opponents' moves and using its powerful Judo Crush and Pound abilities to strike with precision. Hornari's day-to-day life consists of intense training and maintaining peak physical condition, as it is always ready to take on any foe that it may encounter.
image_prompt: Hornari::0 a epic fighting-type bull pokemon::2.5, with ornate horns, in a canyon environment, orange ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
